scripts.kill-ports: node -e "const {exec} = require('child_process'); const os = require('os'); const ports = [3000,5500,8000,8080]; ports.forEach(p => { if(os.platform() === 'win32') { exec(`netstat -ano | findstr :${p} | for /f \"tokens=5\" %a in ('more') do taskkill /F /PID %a`, ()=>{}); } else { exec(`lsof -ti:${p} | xargs kill -9`, ()=>{}); } });"
